# accessoryController

**Instance Property**

A view controller for the accessory view that the panel can present.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var accessoryController: NSViewController? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The PDF panel passes an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPDFInfo] object to the accessory view controller to display the various attributes associated with the PDF file. Unlike a print panel (that is, an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPrintPanel] object), a PDF panel can have only one accessory view.

## Managing the Contents of a PDF Panel

- **options**: A set of configuration options that determine the accessory views the PDF panel should display.
- **defaultFileName**: The initial value for the user-editable filename shown in the name field of the PDF panel.
